sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { CartContext } from '../contexts/CartContext' export default function CartScreen() { const { cart } = useContext(CartContext); return (

Mi Carro

{cart.total}

{ cart.items.length > 0 ? cart.items.map((item, idx)=>{ return (

{item.name} - "{item.varie}"

Precio : { item.cant } * { item.price} = {item.price}

Cantidad : { item.cant }

) }):"Sin Elementos" }
) }
